detect

Class Detect

  • java.lang.Object
    • detect.Detect

  • public class Detect
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to detect nonconformances in Java/JML programs.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alysson Milanez and Dennis Sousa.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Detect(int comp)
      The constructor of this class, creates a new instance of Detect class, creates the jmlok directory and set the JML compiler used.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<TestError> detect(java.lang.String source, java.lang.String lib, java.lang.String timeout)
      Method used to detect the nonconformances.
      void execute(java.lang.String sourceFolder, java.lang.String libFolder, java.lang.String timeout)
      Method that executes the scripts to conformance checking.
      void generateTests(java.lang.String libFolder, java.lang.String timeout)
      Method used to generate the tests to conformance checking.
      void javaCompile(java.lang.String sourceFolder, java.lang.String libFolder)
      Method to Java compilation of the files (needed for tests generation).
      void jmlCompile(java.lang.String sourceFolder)
      Method used to do the JML compilation of the files.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Detect

        public Detect(int comp)
        The constructor of this class, creates a new instance of Detect class, creates the jmlok directory and set the JML compiler used.
        Parameters:
        comp - = the integer that indicates which JML compiler will be used.

    • Method Detail

      • detect

        public java.util.Set<TestError> detect(java.lang.String source,
                              java.lang.String lib,
                              java.lang.String timeout)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Method used to detect the nonconformances.
        Parameters:
        source - = the path to classes directory.
        lib - = the path to external libraries directory.
        timeout - = the time to tests generation.
        Returns:
        - The list of nonconformances detected.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - When some XML cannot be read.

      • execute

        public void execute(java.lang.String sourceFolder,
           java.lang.String libFolder,
           java.lang.String timeout)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Method that executes the scripts to conformance checking.
        Parameters:
        sourceFolder - = the path to source of files to be tested.
        libFolder - = the path to external libraries needed for the current SUT.
        timeout - = the time to tests generation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - When some XML cannot be read.

      • javaCompile

        public void javaCompile(java.lang.String sourceFolder,
               java.lang.String libFolder)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to Java compilation of the files (needed for tests generation).
        Parameters:
        sourceFolder - = the path to source files.
        libFolder - = the path to external libraries needed to Java compilation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - When the XML cannot be read.

      • generateTests

        public void generateTests(java.lang.String libFolder,
                 java.lang.String timeout)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Method used to generate the tests to conformance checking.
        Parameters:
        libFolder - = the path to external libraries needed to tests generation and compilation.
        timeout - = the time to tests generation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - When the XML cannot be read.

      • jmlCompile

        public void jmlCompile(java.lang.String sourceFolder)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Method used to do the JML compilation of the files.
        Parameters:
        sourceFolder - = the source of files to be compiled.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - When the XML cannot be read.
